Posts.Content: Sorry to hear of the death of your mom. May God who comforts all comfort you and grant you peace. My mom passed away in November because of a heart attack. I miss her and I can understand how you feel. If you have time, let us pray for those with cancer..here is the list http://www.prayer-for-cancer.com . Blessings, Chester
Posts.Title: My mom has passed away

Posts.Content: On 5/8/2008 sunshineMuriel wrote:   On 5/8/2008 Prayer for Cancer wrote: Sorry to hear of the death of your mom. May God who comforts all comfort you and grant you peace. My mom passed away in November because of a heart attack. I miss her and I can understand how you feel. If you have time, let us pray for those with cancer..here is the list http://www.prayer-for-cancer.com . Blessings, Chester Thank you Chester for your kind words. I know that God gives comfort, because I am comforted everyday from him. He has given me unspeakable strength. SunshineMuriel You are welcome. His strength is made perfect in our weakness (2 Corinthians 12:9). May The Great Comforter be by your side each and every day. Blessings, Chester
